DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate safety, tolerability and efficacy of oral GW679769 up to 120 mg dose compared to placebo in patients with ACR(American College of Rheumatology)-defined fibromyalgia, co-morbid with depression.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Diagnosis of fibromyalgia (ACR criteria). Nonsevere depression (HAMD score >14 <24). Women must commit to consistent use of an acceptable method of birth control. Exclusion criteria: Severe depression (HAMD score > 24). Unable to discontinue medications for pain or depression. Laboratory and ECG value at screening outside sponsor defined ranges. Positive to stool occult blood test.
